pr_title: fix: Restrict access to the METADATASTORE namespace

timeline.message:
fix: Restrict access to the METADATASTORE namespace

Signed-off-by: Morten Svanaes <msvanaes@dhis2.org>

timeline.author: mortenoh

timeline.bodyText: Instead of hard coding it like this, maybe we could have a list of "ignored" namespaces? there might be more reserved namespaces in the future..
timeline.author: mortenoh

replies.bodyText:
That sounds like a sensible idea!
On the other hand, we want to get this patch out ASAP, so we could refactor later, when we need to?
replies.author: Philip-Larsen-Donnelly

replies.bodyText: Agree, this makes sense soon as there will be more than one "hidden" namespace.
replies.author: netroms
